name: Tibbatu
description: Traditionally, turkey berries are used in household meals, giving meals a somewhat bitter taste. Apart from that, the turkey berries have some amazing healing benefits such as: protection from cancer, treatment for diabetes, treatment of indigestion and diarrhea, prevention of cardiovascular diseases and strokes and many more.
